Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12816 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-21
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12816 affecting package reaper for versions less than 3.1.1-21. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package reaper is earlier than 3.1.1-21, affected by CVE-2025-12816
